zh: 主要基于Hadoop体系构建，针对工业企业缺乏数据基础、元数据管理、海量数据存储、工业机理通过大数据进行故障分析、预测维修等困难进行技术攻破，降低工业企业应用大数据的成本和门槛。
en: It is mainly based on the Hadoop system construction, and technical breakthroughs are made for the lack of data foundation, metadata management, massive data storage, industrial mechanism through big data failure analysis, predictive maintenance and other difficulties in industrial enterprises, so as to reduce the cost and threshold for industrial enterprises to apply big data.

zh: H-DIS汉云数据集成服务（简称H-DIS）是徐工信息对外提供的可跨系统的、安全可靠、低成本、高并发、可扩展的数据同步服务，支持MySQL、PostgreSQL、Redis、Hbase等多种关系型数据库、NoSQL数据库全量及增量数据迁移，可帮助用户轻松完成数据迁移上云。同时也支持异构数据库和同构数据库之间迁移和同步。
en: H-DIS Hanyun Data Integration Service (H-DIS for short) is a cross-system, safe, reliable, low-cost, high-concurrency, and scalable data synchronization service provided by XCMG Information. It supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, Hbase, etc. Full and incremental data migration of various relational databases and NoSQL databases can help users easily complete data migration to the cloud. It also supports migration and synchronization between heterogeneous databases and homogeneous databases.

zh: 支持关系型数据库、NOSQL数据库、非结构化存储、大数据存储之间的数据同步。
en: Supports data synchronization between relational databases, NOSQL databases, unstructured storage, and big data storage.

zh: 支持高并发、高质量的传输机制，保证每个迁移同步任务都能拥有良好的传输性能。
en: It supports high concurrency and high quality transmission mechanism to ensure that each migration synchronization task can have good transmission performance.

zh: 数据集成提供可视化配置管理任务，监控同步任务运行情况，并对异常任务进行告警。
en: Data integration provides visual configuration management tasks, monitors the running status of synchronization tasks, and alerts abnormal tasks.

zh: 数据开发提供可视化开发的主界面，赋予用户低代码开发、托拉拽式工作流、流程化工程自动部署发布的强大能力，让用户轻松构建工业应用、数据仓库等。支持引擎：MapReduce、Spark、Flink、Druid，满足用户不同业务场景。
en: Data development provides the main interface of visual development, empowers users with low-code development, drag-and-drop workflow, and automatic deployment and release of process engineering, allowing users to easily build industrial applications, data warehouses, etc. Support engines: MapReduce, Spark, Flink, Druid, to meet different business scenarios of users.

zh: 初级技术人员1~2小时即可完成相关业务流程开发，低代码服务让开发变得容易、无码化托拉拽方式降低企业开发成本。
en: Junior technicians can complete related business process development in 1-2 hours. Low-code services make development easier, and code-free drag-and-drop methods reduce enterprise development costs.

zh: 用户可自定义需求、评审、代码分支、发布测试流程，支持跨引擎、跨地域、跨周期的任务调度。
en: Users can customize requirements, review, code branching, and release testing processes, and support task scheduling across engines, regions, and cycles.

zh: 高效的多人协同任务开发模式，快速的上线发布流程，便捷的运维管理。
en: Efficient multi-person collaborative task development mode, fast online release process, convenient operation and maintenance management.

zh: 传统基于批量模型的数据分析无法实时化。流计算是汉云工业大数据平台基于Apache Flink构建的企业级工业大数据开发平台，无缝对接多种流式数据源进行实时分析。
en: Traditional batch model-based data analysis cannot be real-time. Stream computing is an enterprise-level industrial big data development platform built by Hanyun Industrial Big Data Platform based on Apache Flink, which seamlessly connects multiple streaming data sources for real-time analysis.

zh: 只用掌握SQL就能进行实时分析。
en: Real-time analysis is possible only by mastering SQL.
Thousands of nodes can be supported.

zh: 高吞吐-每秒处理的数据量很大、低延迟-数据产生时Flink立刻可以处理掉，数据的产生到处理间隔的时间很短。
en: High throughput - large amount of data processed per second, low latency - Flink can process data immediately when it is generated, and the time between data generation and processing is very short.

zh: 汉云工业大数据平台丰富灵活的离线处理模式，支持Hive、Spark、SparkSQL、Tez等多种计算引擎。您可以根据需要选择，同时支持丰富的数据存储，不同存储位置的数据都可以被访问和使用。
en: Hanyun industrial big data platform has rich and flexible offline processing modes, and supports Hive, Spark, SparkSQL, Tez and other computing engines. You can choose according to your needs, while supporting rich data storage, data in different storage locations can be accessed and used.

zh: 可以根据不同业务部门的需要，组合并选择运行相应版本的Hive、Spark、Hbase等大数据组件。可通过管理控制台，方便的对节点、组件、进程进行监控告警配置和运维操作。
en: According to the needs of different business departments, you can combine and choose to run the corresponding version of Hive, Spark, Hbase and other big data components. Through the management console, it is convenient to monitor, configure, and operate nodes, components, and processes.

zh: 可通过管理控制台，方便的对节点、组件、进程进行监控告警配置和运维操作。丰富的运维工具支持，助您大幅提升运维工作效率，让工程师更专注于业务本身的商业价值，摆脱重复搭建监控、安全、运维工具等基础设施。
en: Through the management console, it is convenient to monitor, configure, and operate nodes, components, and processes. Rich operation and maintenance tool support can help you greatly improve the efficiency of operation and maintenance work, let engineers focus more on the business value of the business itself, and get rid of the repeated construction of infrastructure such as monitoring, security, and operation and maintenance tools.

zh: 复杂的工业业务场景通常会产生繁杂多样的日志，如System Log、MySQL Log等，往往很难从繁杂的日志中获取价值，却要承担其存储的成本。借助汉云工业大数据日志分析功能可以快速对接各种常见数据源，并提供开箱即用的分析能力，借助仪表板等报表工具可快速高效的进行可视化日志分析工作。让日志快速产生价值而不至于成为累赘。
en: Complex industrial business scenarios usually generate complex and diverse logs, such as System Log, MySQL Log, etc. It is often difficult to obtain value from complex logs, but it has to bear the cost of their storage. With the help of Hanyun's industrial big data log analysis function, you can quickly connect to various common data sources and provide out-of-the-box analysis capabilities. With the help of dashboards and other reporting tools, you can quickly and efficiently perform visual log analysis. Let the log generate value quickly without becoming a burden.

zh: 适应业务发展需求，提供服务不中断前提下的集群弹性扩容能力。
en: Adapt to business development needs and provide cluster elastic expansion capabilities without service interruption.

zh: 提供两层数据及系统权限控制。节点间传输加密，并提供Https的访问端口。
en: Provides two layers of data and system permission control. The transmission between nodes is encrypted, and the access port of Https is provided.

zh: H-DW数据仓库（简称H-DW）为您提供简单、快速、经济高效的 PB 级云端数据仓库解决方案。H-DW是一种基于 MPP（大规模并行处理）架构的数仓服务。借助于H-DW，您可以使用丰富的 PostgreSQL 等开源生态工具，实现对海量工业数据的即时查询分析、ETL 处理及可视化探索。
en: H-DW Data Warehouse (H-DW for short) provides you with a simple, fast and cost-effective PB-level cloud data warehouse solution. H-DW is a data warehouse service based on MPP (massively parallel processing) architecture. With the help of H-DW, you can use a wealth of open source ecological tools such as PostgreSQL to realize instant query analysis, ETL processing and visual exploration of massive industrial data.

zh: 通过控制台操作，即可实现集群管理、监控维护等工作，无需关注底层基础设施的繁重运维工作，完全支持ANSI SQL 2008标准，使用标准SQL即可构建企业级数据仓库。支持直接查询COS数据，而无需提前数据预加载。
en: Through the console operation, you can achieve cluster management, monitoring and maintenance, and do not need to pay attention to the heavy operation and maintenance of the underlying infrastructure. It fully supports the ANSI SQL 2008 standard, and you can build an enterprise-level data warehouse using standard SQL. Supports direct query of COS data without data preloading in advance.

zh: 支持COS云存储扩展，实现存储空间的无限扩展。搭配多种工具及方案支持多源数据（如传统关系型数据库、Ckafka、流计算等）告诉导入，实现对云端多元数据的汇聚分析。
en: Support COS cloud storage expansion to achieve unlimited expansion of storage space. With a variety of tools and solutions, it supports the import of multi-source data (such as traditional relational databases, Ckafka, stream computing, etc.), and realizes the aggregation and analysis of cloud-based multi-data.

zh: 基于分布式大规模并行处理MPP框架，可线性扩展存储及计算能力。支持行列混合存储，可按业务需求选择最佳存储方案。查询引擎深度优化，查询效率数倍于传统数据仓库。
en: Based on the distributed massively parallel processing MPP framework, the storage and computing power can be linearly expanded. Row-column hybrid storage is supported, and the best storage solution can be selected according to business needs. The query engine is deeply optimized, and the query efficiency is several times that of the traditional data warehouse.

zh: 总体功能介绍：数据治理是汉云工业互联网平台为您提供的数据综合治理和管理能力。用于掌握数据资产的现状、助力数据质量的提升、提高数据集成能力、保障数据安全并提升数据查询的分析效率。
en: General function introduction: Data governance is the comprehensive data governance and management capability provided by Hanyun Industrial Internet Platform. It is used to grasp the status quo of data assets, help improve data quality, improve data integration capabilities, ensure data security, and improve the analysis efficiency of data query.

zh: 数据资产以统一元数据作为核心，您可以便捷地发现数据进行存储，并且注册元数据至数据治理中心，提供全局数据检索能力，并在数据详情页面查看数据流入、产出等血缘信息。
en: Data assets are based on unified metadata. You can easily discover data for storage, and register metadata to the Data Governance Center to provide global data retrieval capabilities, and view bloodline information such as data inflow and output on the data details page.

zh: 提供表的血缘和字段血缘，清晰展现工业数据关联关系。
en: The blood relationship and field blood relationship of the table are provided to clearly show the relationship between industrial data.

zh: 汉云数据质量体系提供全方位数据质量评估和监控分析能力，通过配置化的度量规则对数据的重复性、关联性、正确性、完全性、一致性、合规性等进行分析，对数据进行全面体检。
en: The Hanyun data quality system provides comprehensive data quality assessment and monitoring and analysis capabilities. It analyzes the repeatability, relevance, correctness, completeness, consistency, and compliance of data through configured measurement rules. Comprehensive physical examination.

zh: 聚焦工业大数据管理，洞察工业数据价值。
en: Focus on industrial big data management and gain insight into the value of industrial data.

zh: 提供数据资产管理、数据质量、数据血缘、数据安全和生命周期管理等功能特性。
en: Provides features such as data asset management, data quality, data lineage, data security, and lifecycle management.

zh: 有效支撑数据仓库构建、数据交互式查询和处理分析、海量工业数据智能报表构建。
en: Effectively supports data warehouse construction, data interactive query and processing analysis, and massive industrial data intelligent report construction.
